text: Andrias Høgnason Eriksen (born 22 February 1994) is a Faroese footballer who plays as a defender for B36 Tórshavn and the Faroe Islands national team. ==Career== Eriksen made his international debut for Faroe Islands on 8 September 2019 in a UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying match against Spain, which finished as a 0–4 away loss. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Faroe Islands |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2019||1||0 |- !Total!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * Andrias Eriksen at FaroeSoccer.com Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Faroese footballers Category:Faroe Islands youth international footballers Category:Faroe Islands under-21 international footballers Category:Faroe Islands international footballers Category:Faroese expatriate footballers Category:Faroese expatriate sportspeople in Denmark Category:Expatriate footballers in Denmark Category:Association football defenders Category:B36 Tórshavn players Category:Faroe Islands Premier League players Category:1. deild players
title: Andrias Eriksen
